PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-07942012-06-07,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActCanada Transportation Act
SubjectAsia-Pacific Gateway and Corridor Transportation Infrastructure Fund
PrecisOrder (1) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2008-1756 of November 20, 2008; and (2) authorizing the Minister of Transport to enter into contribution agreements in an amount not to exceed $400,000,000 for each project and in an amount not to exceed $750,000,000 for each recipient for the purpose of implementing the ASIA-PACIFIC GATEWAY AND CORRIDOR TRANSPORTATION INFRASTRUCTURE FUND.
AttachmentsAttachment
